description: This file provides client-side security helper functions, including input sanitization, a wrapper for localStorage operations, and a stub for fetching a CSRF token.

methods.name: export function sanitizeInput(s: string): string { sanitizeInput
methods.description: Sanitizes input string by removing control characters and limiting length.

methods.name: safeStorage.get
methods.description: Retrieves a value from localStorage by key, returning null if unavailable.

methods.name: safeStorage.set
methods.description: Stores a key-value pair in localStorage, with error handling.

methods.name: safeStorage.remove
methods.description: Removes an item from localStorage by key, with error handling.

methods.name: export async function getCsrfToken(): Promise<string> { getCsrfToken
methods.description: Asynchronously returns a CSRF token, currently a stub.
